meanings.definition: A sweet baked dessert typically made from a mixture of flour, sugar, eggs, and butter.
meanings.sent1: Mom baked delicious cakes for my birthday party.
meanings.sent2: I love to eat cakes with frosting on special occasions.
meanings.sent3: The cakes disappeared quickly at the bake sale.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for baking cakes is as impressive as her art skills.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked cakes filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A flat, round mass of food, such as a pancake or a patty.
meanings.sent1: The waiter brought out a plate of fluffy pancakes.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy having savory cakes for breakfast.
meanings.sent3: The stack of pancakes looked like a tower on the plate.
meanings.sent4: The crab cakes at the seafood restaurant were exceptional.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of sizzling cakes filled the diner.

meanings.definition: A thick or sticky layer of something.
meanings.sent1: After the rain, there was a layer of mud cakes on the path.
meanings.sent2: The cakes of paint on the wall needed another coat.
meanings.sent3: The cakes of snow on the branches made the trees look magical.
meanings.sent4: The cakes of ice on the windshield were hard to remove.
meanings.sent5: The cakes of dust on the shelves needed to be wiped clean.
